studio_selfie.prompt: Professional portrait photo, person looking directly at the camera, very detailed, shows imperfections, analytical photography, no text, studio lighting, plain neutral background 50% grey, plain white shirt, closeup headshot, padding around the face 10% on the top and 25% on the bottom

studio_posture.prompt: Whole person standing in a studio, whole body MUST BE visible with some padding around it, looking directly at the camera, padding around the body should be 10% on the top and bottom, standing straight, only minimal clothing (white t-shirt and shorts), hands loose on the sides, legs slightly apart, both feed on the ground, symmetrical pose, very detailed, shows imperfections, analytical photography, no text, studio lighting, plain neutral background 50% grey, full body

character_sheet.prompt: Create a character reference sheet for the person, based on the studio selfie and studio posture, using the character sheet template, keep the layout of the template as is, keep text descriptions and border boxes

emotions_sheet.prompt: Create a facial expressions grid for the person, based on the studio selfie, using the emotions sheet template, keep the layout of the template as is, keep text descriptions and border boxes

amateur_selfie.prompt: Create a casual selfie for the person, casual clothes, based on the character sheet, using the amateur selfie template, casual context, taken on Android, amateur photo, no text, no visible phone

amateur_posture.prompt: Create a casual full body photo for the person, casual clothes, whole body MUST BE visible with some padding around it, based on the character sheet, using the amateur posture template, casual context, taken on Android, amateur photo, no text
